title: Blade Runner 2048
description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Dune
description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

title: Joker
description: It tells, in an original story, the transformation of Arthur Fleck into Joker, a dangerous psychopathic killer who will subsequently become Batman's greatest enemy.

title: Le parrain
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Rebelle
description: The story takes place in an imaginary kingdom in medieval Scotland. Princess MÃ©rida, an independent young girl who refuses to marry, accidentally turns her mother into a bear following an argument and must find a way to save both her mother and the kingdom without giving up her ideal of life.

title: Avengers
description: Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as SHIELD, recruits a team of superheroes to save the world from an unexpected enemy.

title: Oppenheimer
description: The story of the development of the atomic bomb by the Manhattan Project during World War II.

title: Shrek
description: Shrek, an ogre who lives in a swamp, sees his life turned upside down when a horde of fairy tale characters are exiled to his land by the evil Lord Farquaad. To get his peace back, Shrek makes a deal with the tyrant: he will rescue Princess Fiona, Farquaad's future wife, from a tower guarded by a dragon, in exchange for the eviction of the intruders.
